## modOsc variable

Syntax sugar for creating frequency modulated `Osc` gens.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
modOsc: (osc: StatelessOscillator, freq: number | IGen<number>, fmod: IGen<number>, amod?: number | IGen<number>) => Osc
```

## Remarks

The `fmod` value defines the +/- normalized frequency modulation range, added to the main oscillator `freq`<!-- -->.

## Example


```ts
// FM sin osc using rect osc as modulator
modOsc(sin, 0.01, osc(rect, 0.1, 0.2))

// FM & AM sin osc using rect osc as fmod and saw as amod
modOsc(sin, 0.01, osc(rect, 0.1, 0.2), osc(saw, 0.05))


```
